### What we do

<br> The **Quantile Regression Lab**

<br> The **Quantile Regression Lab** is a dynamic and innovative team that brings together scholars from various universities across Italy and Europe. Our group is dedicated to advancing Quantile Regression modeling in a wide range of fields, including:

-   Multivariate quantiles
-   Machine learning
-   Quantile graphical models
-   Survey sampling
-   Mixed-effects models
-   Small area estimation

The methodologies developed by our group have been successfully applied, among other areas, to:

-   Time series analysis
-   Finance
-   Economics
-   Climate change
-   Poverty mapping

These results have been published in several scientific journals. Click here to see a list of [selected publications](sel_pubs.html).
